ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: I never said it was earth shattering.  I merely am pointing out that people tend to exaggerate the facts when they get something put in their head from other
ygData.messageBody:
I never said it was earth shattering. I merely am pointing out that people tend
to exaggerate the facts when they get something put in their head from other
more vocal people.

and yeah, it was an amazing amount of damage for me compared to how much
damage i usually do on these things, hehehehe.

and you can't really discount pvp, it is a part of the game.

At 06:23 PM 2/25/01 -0500, you wrote:
>and i bet you did an amazing amount of damage. if it was resisted, the
>whole raid would have been wiped out, lucky you had it memmed. ok
>enough sarcasm. dammit Whee! you can't defend DDD. i enjoy your side
>of many a discussion, but for once in your life admit that someone else
>is right, and that DDD is utterly and completely worthless. and don't
>say PvP.
>
>Shada
